ing: 1 (28 ounce) can peeled and diced tomatoes
des: "This is a quick recipe for tomato sauce.  I have just given the outline for the sauce, but you can add any kind of vegetables to it.  I especially like it with mushrooms and peppers."
ins: In a large saucepan heat oil over medium heat.  Saute onion, green onion and garlic.  When onions are clear, stir in tomatoes, basil, oregano and sugar.  Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer for 20 minutes.
